t: If you 'Flip' the door sticker, it will open/close. That is because it has multiple sides.

If you delete a piece, [Ctrl]+[z] can undo most mistakes.

Now switch to table #4.
Right-click -> Edit on a piece shows you an Edit window. So does selecting a piece and pressing [e].
Most things can also be changed quickly by using hot-keys. Press [h] to open the help window - they are listed there.

Now let's manipulate those pieces!

Not all pieces support all features, so try and see which do and which don't!
